title: the new star guardian icon/free icon with quiz??
body: so i did the quiz it said i unlock this cute icon so i logged out then logged in... where my icon riot please fix :) btw i got {{champion:222}}  as my result and i'll be buying the star guardian  {{champion:222}}  once you actually give me my icon that you gave me for free..

replies.body: Riot has to gift the icon to everyone who took the quiz, so be patient.
You missed all the spots where it says it takes several days to process due to high server load?

Hey CrazyBlazinStone -

While we originally stated it would take 2-3 days, we've upped it to a week due to so many players looking to channel their inner Star Guardian! Sorry for the wait!
